transcript:
[Music]
no one has ever died from a snake bite
it's never happened
they don't die from the bite itself what
they die from is the venom that is
coursing through their veins after the
bite
why am i telling you this because the
snake is the person who screwed you over
the venom
is the resentment that you are still
holding on to the anger that you won't
let go of
now when you're bitten by a snake you
don't focus on trying to be unbitten by
the snake that can't be done
you focus on one thing and one thing
only
how to get that venom out of your body
as fast as possible
and getting mad at the snake is not
going to help your healing in any way
see what i'm truly talking about here is
not the snake what i'm talking about is
the person that cheated on you
the person that broke your heart
the person that abused you
the person that never paid you back
the person who bullied you
the person who walked out on you and
left you for someone else
and all of the people that you have told
yourself that you have the right to be
resentful and angry towards
and that anger and resentment is the
venom inside of your body that only ends
up harming you so why do you continue to
hold on to it what is it doing for you
nothing
holding on to your anger is like tightly
holding on to acid hoping that it burns
the person who wronged you but it will
do nothing to them it will only burn
right through your own hands
so as hard as it might be
you need to forgive them you need to get
the venom out of your veins
this is the only way to get yourself
right again
and believe me you're not forgiving them
for their sake you're forgiving them to
heal yourself
that is the secret to forgiveness so let
go of your hate
your anger
your resentment
your sadness
because it's like the quote says
forgiveness doesn't excuse them for
their behavior it prevents their
behavior from destroying your heart
[Music]
hey everybody thanks so much for
watching this video if you loved it
please do me a favor hit that share
button down below so that more people
can get more messages like this and if
you want to follow along you can go
ahead and follow my page i have new
videos that come out every single week
but until then i appreciate you and i
hope that you guys have a great day
because it's like the quote says
forgiveness doesn't excuse them for
their behavior it prevents their
behavior from destroying your heart
she's like let me get in right at the
end
let me try one more time ready
